item.title: Update README.md
item.description: https://middleware.io/ - Middleware observability platform provides complete visibility into your apps & stack, so you can monitor & diagnose issues at scale. They have a free forever plan for Dev community use that allows Log monitoring for upto 1M log events, Infrastructure monitoring & APM for upto 2 hosts.

item.title: Update README.md
item.description: https://middleware.io/ - Middleware observability platform provides complete visibility into your apps & stack, so you can monitor & diagnose issues at scale. They have a free forever plan for Dev community use that allows upto Log monitoring for upto 1M log events, Infrastructure monitoring & APM for upto 2 hosts.

item.title: Add WunderGraph
item.description: https://wundergraph.com/pricing - An open source platform that allows you to quickly build, ship and manage modern APIs. Builtin CI/CD, GitHub integration, automatic HTTPS. Up to 3 projects, 1GB egress, 300 minutes of build time per month on the [free plan](https://wundergraph.com/pricing)

item.title: Update Okta
item.description: https://developer.okta.com/signup/ - User management, authentication and authorization. Free for up to 100 monthly active users.

item.title: Remove Okta and update description of auth0
item.description: https://auth0.com/ - Hosted SSO. Up to 7000 active users and 2 social identity providers.

item.title: Add datalore
item.description: https://datalore.jetbrains.com - Python notebooks by Jetbrains. Includes 10 GB of storage and 120 hours of runtime each month.
